thread.section_title: The Blakely New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, helpful staff
thread.title_full: Great location, helpful staff - Review of The Blakely New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jon C
title: Great location, helpful staff
text: My family of 5 (kids ages 13, 11 and 9) stayed in a 2xQueen, 1xdaybed room. The room was just enough for us all. We brought a sound machine and all slept well. The day bed room does get some hall noise, but the bed room was quiet. The hotel was an easy walk to rock center, Central Park and Times Square. The Black Tap restaurant was a nice bonus, especially for the kids. Must try the crazy shakes.
